function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High dependence on migrant workers in the construction sector","Impact":"Labor shortage, decreased productivity, and increased labor costs due to migrant workers being away from the site","Mitigation":"Invest in technology for automation, create training programs for local workforce, and improve working conditions to attract local talent","Technologies":"Automation systems, remote monitoring and management tools, virtual collaboration platforms","People":"Construction sector management, labor contractors","Owner":"Construction sector management, government"},{"Description":"Increased labor working hours without addressing labor concerns","Impact":"Excessive burden on labor, potential for decreased safety and productivity","Mitigation":"Implement flexible working arrangements, provide adequate compensation and benefits, and prioritize worker safety","Technologies":"Scheduling and workforce management software, safety monitoring systems","People":"Labor unions, construction sector management","Owner":"Labor unions, construction sector management"},{"Description":"Economic impact on labor costs, project costs, and recovery of damages","Impact":"Rising labor and project costs, increased financial burden due to delays, and inability to recover damages","Mitigation":"Develop contingency plans, renegotiate contracts, and invest in infection control measures to reduce additional costs","Technologies":"Financial management software, risk assessment tools, infection control technology","People":"Clients, contractors, project managers","Owner":"Clients, contractors, project managers"}]}
